name: Ballot Dash!
description:
Reach the voting ballot before time runs out! Avoid activists along the way.

- WASD to move
- SPACE to speed up text

 Made during a 4-hour elections game jam.

Programming by:
Amir Blum
Michael Hazani

Level Design:
Benjamin Berthelot

With art from:
Yadid Akerman

*Hebrew text did not work in WebGL build, so download the .exe to experience voting day as a true Israeli!
